newsitem.title: ROMANIA: ROMANIA AGRO-FOOD PRICES SLIP 1.4 PCT IN NOV.
newsitem.headline: ROMANIA AGRO-FOOD PRICES SLIP 1.4 PCT IN NOV.

text.p: Average prices of main agro-food products sold at Romanian marketplaces went down by 1.4 percent in November after October's 4.2 percent fall, National Statistics Board (CNS) data showed.

It said prices of vegetable products -- grains and flour, potatoes, fruit -- dropped by 4.2 percent in November. Animal products prices -- slaughtered meat, animal fats, milk and dairy products -- rose by 4.0 percent.
Live animals and poultry prices saw a 4.3 percent increase.
